Storrold's Point01431097z3j3ala600hjedfwlat9099qzjv091730692015-02-15T03:54:41ZThe Dragon Demands5014364'''Storrold's Point''' is a large peninsula in the southeast of the lands [[Beyond the Wall|beyond]] [[the Wall]] and on the shores of the [[Shivering Sea]].<ref>Season 2 Bluray: War of the Five Kings feature - Beyond the Wall section</ref>

[[Hardhome]] is located in a sheltered cove at the tip of the peninsula.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Storrold's Point is where Hardhome, a large community of [[wildlings]], is located.
